title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 3: Max Strength Development
goal: Increase force production for longer effective drive with stable posture.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Strength: Back Squat 5x5, Deadlift 5x3 @RPE7–8, Bench Pull 5x5
UT1 steady 60' @20 spm; include 10' technique drill mid-piece
Boat: 6x6' @20 spm, power on drives (force curve smooth)
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: 5x5 strength focus. Week 2: 4x4 @↑load; maintain two aerobic steady sessions.
